required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 14, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Safety and Clinical Efficacy of AZVUDINE in COVID-19 Patients (SARS-CoV-2 Infected)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Safety and Clinical Efficacy of AZVUDINE in COVID-19 Patients (SARS-CoV-2 Infected): Phase III, Randomized, Double-blind, PLACEBO Controlled Trial

collaborator.agency: GALZU INSTITUTE OF RESEARCH, TEACHING, SCIENCE AND APPLIED TECHNOLOGY, Brazil
SANTA CASA DE MISERICORDIA DE CAMPOS HOSPITAL (SCMCH), Brazil
UNIVERSIDADE ESTADUAL DO NORTE FLUMINENSE (UENF), Brazil

brief_summary.textblock: Estimated number of participants: 342 participants with COVID-19 Design: Phase III, single-center, randomized, double-blind, parallel, placebo-controlled clinical study.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of clinical improvement of AZVUDINE (FNC) in COVID-19 treatment
primary_outcome.description: Rate of participants who reduced at least one level of the Clinical Progression Ordinal Scale category compared to the enrollment status (WHO, Jun/2020)

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical cure outcome rate
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants with clinical cure outcome during the study (viral RNA not detected and clinical conditions for discharge)

secondary_outcome.measure: Recovery of body temperature
secondary_outcome.description: Time (days) for normalization of body temperature (below 37.6℃ axillary);

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical improvement of diarrhea, myalgia fatigue and other symptoms
secondary_outcome.description: Time (days) for clinical improvement of diarrhea, myalgia, fatigue, and other symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of inflammatory biochemical markers (Reactive C Protein, erythrocyte sedimentation rate, and Procalcitonin)
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of change in biochemical markers of inflammatory function in relation to the physiological reference intervals between the AZVUDINA and PLACEBO groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of immunological function biochemical markers (IL-6, IgG, IgM, IgA, and complement factor C3 and C4)
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of change in biochemical markers of immunological function in relation to the physiological reference intervals between the AZVUDINA and PLACEBO groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of renal function biochemical markers (serum creatinine and calculated glomerular filtration rate)
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of change in biochemical markers of renal function in relation to the physiological reference intervals between the AZVUDINA and PLACEBO groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of liver function biochemical markers (AST/TGO, ALT/TGP, ALP, GGT, BIL total, and direct BIL)
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of change in biochemical markers of hepatic function in relation to the physiological reference intervals between the AZVUDINA and PLACEBO groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of time to negative conversion of SARS-CoV-2 viral load by RT-PCR
secondary_outcome.description: Time (days) to negative conversion of the SARS-CoV-2 viral load between AZVUDINE (FNC) and placebo group

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the number of cycles for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 viral load by RT-PCR and application of the standard curve for calculating viral load
secondary_outcome.description: SARS-CoV-2 viral load determination by standard-curve method of quantification

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of the relationship between the calculated viral load and the clinical evolution of the participants in the experimental group (FNC) and the PLACEBO group
secondary_outcome.description: Rating the relationship between viral load calculated and clinical outcomes of participants

secondary_outcome.measure: Time for improvement of pulmonary condition by imaging exams during treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Time (days) for pulmonary image improvement of: (1) Ground glass opacity pattern, (2) mosaic paving, (3) alveolar consolidation, (4) reticular pattern / septal thickening, (5) opaque with inverted halo, (6) pleural / pericardial effusion, (7) fibrosis and / or (8) lymphadenomegaly.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of pulmonary condition by imaging exams during treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of pulmonary image improvement of: (1) Ground glass opacity pattern, (2) mosaic paving, (3) alveolar consolidation, (4) reticular pattern / septal thickening, (5) opaque with inverted halo, (6) pleural / pericardial effusion, (7) fibrosis and / or (8) lymphadenomegaly.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time for clinical improvement of respiratory signs and symptoms
secondary_outcome.description: Time (days) for improvement in respiratory signs and symptoms during treatment (pulmonary rales, cough, sputum, or sore throat)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of clinical improvement of respiratory signs and symptoms
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of improvement in respiratory signs and symptoms during treatment (pulmonary rales, cough, sputum, or sore throat)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time for normalization of O2 saturation
secondary_outcome.description: Time (days) to normalize O2 saturation (above 95%) between AZVUDINE (FNC) and placebo group

secondary_outcome.measure: Respiratory rate evaluation
secondary_outcome.description: Time (days) for respiratory rate normalization ≤24 rpm in room air

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of supplemental oxygenation or non-invasive ventilation
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of supplemental oxygenation or non-invasive ventilation

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of invasive mechanical ventilation or extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO)
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of invasive mechanical ventilation or extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of moderate cases that progressed to severe cases
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of moderate cases that progressed to severe cases requiring care in an intensive care unit

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of hospitalization time
secondary_outcome.description: Length (days) of hospital stay

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of drug interaction events frequency
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of drug interaction events

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of drug interaction events intensity
secondary_outcome.description: Intensity of drug interaction events (1= Mild; 2= Moderate; 3= Severe; 4= Critical)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of adverse events frequency
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of adverse events intensity
secondary_outcome.description: Intensity of adverse events (1= Mild; 2= Moderate; 3= Severe; 4= Critical)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of unexpected adverse events frequency
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of unexpected adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of unexpected adverse events intensity
secondary_outcome.description: Intensity of unexpected adverse events (1= Mild; 2= Moderate; 3= Severe; 4= Critical)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of serious adverse events frequency
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of serious adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of serious adverse events intensity
secondary_outcome.description: Intensity of serious adverse events (1= Mild; 2= Moderate; 3= Severe; 4= Critical)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall mortality rate
secondary_outcome.description: Mortality rate during the study

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the tolerability of azvudine in the 5 mg regimen orally QD up to 14 days
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment dropout rate due to AZVUDINE/Placebo intolerance.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of adherence of azvudine in the 5 mg regimen orally QD up to 14 days
secondary_outcome.description: Medication possession rate, to measure the proportion of administered dose episodes observed in relation to the expected number of doses, until treatment interruption.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time of use of azvudine in the 5 mg regimen orally QD up to 14 days
secondary_outcome.description: Total time (days) of use of AZVUDINE / Placebo intolerance.

arm_group.description: Experimental: AZVUDINE 1mg tablet, Interventions: AZVUDINE 1mg tablet, 5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days
Control: AZVUDINE placebo, Interventions: AZVUDINE placebo, 5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days

intervention.description: 5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days
5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days

facility.name: Santa Casa de Misericórdia de Campos
